info.title: Assembler
info.description: Assembler is the group of APIs consumed by the Looplex web interface, related to document flows, templates and tasks.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: User operations, such as login and profile consulting

get.description: Exports a document answers in the file format chosen.
Exports a document in the file format chosen.

post.description: Updates a document's answers with a json file.
Updates a document's answers with a json object.

get.summary: Find all documents by template identifier
get.description: Finds all documents created with a specific template by its id.
Get a document by its id.

delete.description: Deletes a document by the its id.
Deletes a document and its generated files by the the document's id.

delete.summary: Delete document and generated files on s3
delete.description: Deletes a document and its generated files on s3 by the the document's id.

get.description: Return all the user's organization tasks.

post.description: Add a new tree of tasks.

get.description: Get a task tree by its root id.

delete.description: Delete a task tree from its root id.

get.description: Find and return all the templates an account has access to, by account id

post.summary: Export a document from JSON-answers and save the document
post.description: Export a document from JSON-answers and the template in the file format chosen, and save the document at last.

post.summary: Export a document from JSON-answers and delete the document
post.description: Export a document from JSON-answers and the template in the file format chosen, and delete the document at last.

get.summary: Find a template by account and template ids
get.description: Find a template associated to an account by their ids

AccountId.name: accountId
AccountId.description: The id associated to the account

DocId.name: docId
DocId.description: The id associated to the document

Ids.name: ids
Ids.description: Format - int64. The id of the documents to be hidden

Filter.name: filter
Filter.description: Search filters. The filters must follow the SCIM pattern, properly url encoded.

PageSize.name: pageSize
PageSize.description: The size of each content page.

Page.name: page
Page.description: The page that will be served.

TaskId.name: taskId
TaskId.description: The id associated to the task

Template.name: template
Template.description: The string that represents the template

TemplateId.name: templateId
TemplateId.description: Format - int64. The numeric id associated to the template

docPath.description: The URL to download the document

documentId.description: The ID of the created document

userId.description: The ID of the user that created the document

answers.description: The object with the answers to populate the document

shelfId.description: Shelf in which the document is located

tags.description: The set of tags attributed to the document

templateId.description: The id of the template used to create the document

templateName.description: The name of the template used to create the document

answers.description: The object with the answers to populate the document

shelfId.description: Shelf in which the document is located

tags.description: The set of tags attributed to the document

templateId.description: The id of the template used to create the document

templateName.description: The name of the template used to create the document

ancestry.description: The path to the task in a tree. For example, a task with the ancestry 1.2 has the task 2 as parent and the task 1 as grandparent.

dueDate.description: When the task should be finished.

updatedAt.description: When the task was last updated.

name.description: The name displayed in the tasks table.

orgPath.description: The id of the organization used to control access.

owner.description: The last user to update the task.

status.description: The current status of the task. It will determine the frame in which the task will appear if it is the root of a tree.

tags.description: The array of tags associated to the task. Open field.

Assignee.title: Assignee
Assignee.description: The user who is responsible for the task.

TaskDocument.title: Document
TaskDocument.description: The document associated to the task.

name.description: The name that will be displayed in the tasks view.
The name that will be displayed in the tasks table

status.description: The current status of the task

tags.description: The tags associated to the task

name.description: The name that will be displayed in the tasks table

status.description: The current status of the task

tags.description: The tags associated to the task

creationDate.description: The date the template was created

id.description: The numeric id associated to the template

identifier.description: The string identifier associated to the template

price.description: The price our system attributed to the template

shelfId.description: The shelf in which the account is located
